name: Human Fisher
description:
Game created for a GameJam Session.

It was my first lone GameJam and also my first 3D game attempt.

The game evolve into different missions (5 for now) and the goal is to FISH UP human stuff.

Feel free to download it, try it and maybe tell me how can I improve my skills as a game developer

P.S. Some assets are self maded other ones was taken from website and are all under Commercial Use License
